snippet: A woman who reported to the F.B.I. that she had received threatening e-mails from a woman romantically linked to David. H. Petraeus, the former C.I.A. director, is a friend of the Petraeus family from Tampa, Fla.
lead_paragraph: A woman who reported to the F.B.I. that she had received threatening e-mails from a woman romantically linked to David. H. Petraeus, the former C.I.A. director, is a friend of the Petraeus family from Tampa, Fla.

headline.seo: Petraeus Friend Jill Kelley Said to Be Threats’ Target
headline.main: Woman Who Reported Threats Is Identified
headline.print_headline: Woman Who Reported Threats Is Identified
